item.title: I have a really good idea. i just need some help
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

Already been thought of:

okay, my idea is that when someone buys something from my site, lets just say donator status and 100mil, when the payment goes threw to my paypal, the buyer recieves 2 auth codes via email., because they bought 2 things, donator status and 100mil, so when they reiceve the codes, they log on to my server and type ::redeemcode and then an interface comes up, and they type the codes, i want the codes to be generated like "7ghD47bxHwq1" so when they type the codes in, they recieve their items/status. to me, this is a good idea and seems very hard, how could i do this?

Read full topic
